{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3479173,"name":"Max Arnold","username":"Rice-Crispies-42","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/rice-crispies-42/{size}/242243_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-11T16:49:39.589Z","cooked":"

Hi, I’m a newer programmer, and yet I’m ironically the most experience on the team. We have been using Limelight 3 in past years and will continue to do so. I am setting up a new Drive/Programming laptop and need to know what I need to install in order to effectively use Limelight with AprilTags and functioning as a vision camera with the WPI Shuffleboard. Thank you for the help!

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2025-01-11T16:49:39.589Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":774,"reads":152,"readers_count":151,"score":3890.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":480934,"topic_slug":"limelight-setup-help","display_username":"Max Arnold","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":70704,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"1555's Programmer"},"post_url":"/t/limelight-setup-help/480934/1","custom_user_title":"1555's Programmer","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3479473,"name":"icemannie","username":"icemannie","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/i/bc79bd/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-11T22:22:07.759Z","cooked":"
docs.limelightvision.io

Downloads | Limelight Documentation

Limelight Hardware Manager

This will get you started with Limelight on a new pc.
You need to pick the latest firmware for the model you have and download it the follow the flashing and configuration procedure here

docs.limelightvision.io

Updating LimelightOS | Limelight Documentation

Follow this guide to update your Limelight Smart Camera to the latest version of LimelightOS.

docs.limelightvision.io

FRC Comms/Networking Setup | Limelight Documentation

We highly recommend following the static IP instructions for reliability during events.

For April Tag use, you should also download the 2025 field map from the downloads page and upload it to the camera

https://downloads.limelightvision.io/models/frc2025.fmap

You can the read through all the Limelight documentation and search this forum for similar questions.
